overview: You hunter behind clouds!  Struck down by your lightning,  Your sarcastic eye, glaring at me out of the dark!  So I lie,  Writhing, twisted, tormented  By all the eternal afflictions,  Struck  By you, cruelest hunter,  You unknown god â€¦  The filmmaker through his art blurs the limits of the ordinary and takes contact with the hidden erotic; the principle of action and magic, the discovery of the alternate configurations of the mysterious nature. www.cinelogos.com / FB: @CineLogosExperimental
title: Phantasmagories
